message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a fair price considering its value, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250.  Let's make this deal work!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
